name: Complete Body
description: Finally, a form you south out for so long, you are complete...

badges.text:
While in End Form:
- You have 8 hearts
- Are 10% slimmer
- 15% less hunger usage

While in Nether Form:
- You have 8 hearts
- Are 1.5 Blocks tall
- 10% more movement speed
- 10% less hunger usage
